testcase.name: Enter a search keyword in google search field And verify search page is displayed
testcase.system-out: Given user open page using url :http://www.google.com.......................passed And user enter value :TrueFit.com in field :googleSearchField...............passed And user click on action with id :googleSearchAction........................passed Then verify page that contains url is displayed :search?source=,=TrueFit.com.passed

testcase.name: Enter an empty search keyword in google search field and verify search page is not displayed
testcase.system-out: Given user open page using url :http://www.google.com.......................passed And user click on submit for action with id :googleSearchAction.............passed Then verify text not present on page :googleImageText,googleVideoText.......passed Then verify page url doesn't contain :search?source=,=TureFit.com...........passed

testcase.name: Verify google home page elements
testcase.system-out: Given user open page using url :http://www.google.com.......................passed Then verify page elements are present :googleImage,googleSearchAction,googleSearchField.passed
